content.body: Is there a good place to discuss the ECMA by-laws and rules? Not sure if this room can be used for that.

Since it is a non-technical discussion, I went ahead and created a private room to discuss the by-laws, rules and different terms of the upcoming partnership. Please let me know if you need an invite.

> <@tabatkins:matrix.org> We should have that as written guidance with instructions for how to set up a channel correctly, in how-we-work or something

I wrote this up [here](https://github.com/tc39/inclusion-group/blob/main/docs/matrix-setup.md) but would be happy to polish it up and move it to how-we-work!

In reply to @tabatkins:matrix.org
We should have that as written guidance with instructions for how to set up a channel correctly, in how-we-work or something
I wrote this up here but would be happy to polish it up and move it to how-we-work!

content.body: Since I had no idea that I should be looking in that repo for anything like this, yes, it would be great to have that in how-we-work. ^_^ Looks good at a quick glance.
yeah, I don't really know why I put it in the inclusion group repo ðŸ˜…
